page.title: 11FARM CROPS (CONTINUED)
page.content: CULTIVATOR. THE GROWING CROP WERE SPRAYED TO CONTROL WEEDS, FUNGI AND INSECTS. FERTILIZERS, BOTH ORGANIC AND INORGANIC, WERE USED. {SPRING BARLEY.}SOWN IN MARCH. GROUND IS CULTIVATED IN WINTER. A POPULAR VARIETY WAS "TRIUMPH". BARLEY WAS USED MAINLY FOR ANIMAL FEED. {POTATOES.}PLANTED IN APRIL. VARITIES INCLUDED WILJA AND PENTLAND DELL.THIS CROP IS HEAVILY IRRIGATED FROM THE MAN MADE POOL WHICH HOLDS APPROX. 38 MILLION LITRES OF WATER. {SUGAR BEET.}HARVESTED IN AUTUMN AND PROCESSED 8 MILES AWAY BY THE BRITISH SUGAR CORPORATION. SEED SOWN IN SPRING IS PELLETED. THIS MAKES THE SEED LARGER AND THUS MORE EASILY SOWN AND SPACED BY MACHINE. ABOUT 15 TONNES OF BEET PRODUCES 2 TONNES OF SUGAR. {OTHER CROPS.}INCLUDE OIL SEED RAPE,WHICH PROVIDES OIL FOR COOKING
